name: nest-typescript-starter-for-cyclic
description: Nest TypeScript starter repository for Cyclic

scripts.preinstall: node -e "JSON.parse(process.env.npm_config_argv)?.original?.[0] === 'add' && (console.log('\x1b[31m' +'\nYou\'re on root, install packages only from the \'nest\' dir!\n') ||  process.exit(-1))"
